snippet.title: Stygian: Outer Gods | Early Access Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Today is a truly momentous occasion, for we are ready to share that we have set a date for the Early Access release of Stygian: Outer Gods - April 14, 2025!

Set in the universe of Stygian: Reign of the Old Ones, the game lets players witness and influence the events preceding the Black Day. Immerse yourself in a unique world full of dangers, unexplored dark corners, and looming evil beyond mortal comprehension.

WISHLIST NOW: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2581410/Stygian_Outer_Gods/
https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/stygian-outer-gods-e5f4c5
https://www.gog.com/en/game/stygian_outer_gods

Accompany an enigmatic occult researcher on a voyage to the foggy town of Kingsport to find your missing father and uncover dark secrets surrounding a coming catastrophe. You are shipwrecked and soon encounter the nightmares that have haunted this place for centuries. Will you be able to find your way out, keep your sanity, and prevent the coming of the ancient Outer Gods, or maybe being insane is the key to salvation?

Follow Fulqrum Publishing on:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/FulqrumPublishing
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/FulqrumPublishing
Website: http://www.FulqrumPublishing.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FulqrumPublishing/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/FulqrumPub
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/FulqrumPublishing/
VK: https://vk.com/fulqrumpublishing

#Stygian #Lovecraft #Videogames
